DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study evaluate continuous administration low dos VA2914 potential contraceptive activity effect menstrual cycle steroid hormone parameter .
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Continuous Administration Progesterone Receptor Modulator VA2914
DOC.criteria: woman good general health regular , ovulatory menstrual cycle age 1835 pregnant sexually active reliably use barrier method contraception normal liver renal function normal laboratory exam pregnant breastfeed oral contraception , IUD hormonal treatment use agent know induce hepatic P450 cardiovascular disorder hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal disorder metrorrhagia abnormal transvaginal ultrasound ( baseline ) history abnormal endometrial biopsy , cancer depression mental illness epilepsy migraine abnormal Pap Smear require exploratory examination anovulatory cycle treatment extreme overweight underweight ( body mass index < 16 ou > 28 ) subject unlikely comply protocol , e.g. , uncooperative attitude , inability return followup visit , unlikelihood completing study use narcotic 10 cigarette per day , 2 glass wine/beer per day surgical procedure plan 6 month follow screen visit
